Hello, I'm Yogendra Mishra (19 y/o, he/him).

I'm currently pursuing BS in Data Science and Applications at IIT Madras.

I have a strong interest in Computer Science and Data Science. I try to stay up to date with the latest developments in the field. I like building things that solve problems of my own and make my life easier. When I'm not on my computer, I like casually hating on gui users, reading books and mangas, surfing wikipedia and reddit, watching documentaries, animes, and movies.
